languages.text: "А ты, значит, молод{mf|ой|ая} фон Валанциус. Весомое имя... и тяжелое, ведь, судя по ее репутации, Теодора обременила его многими грехами. Интересно, захочешь ли ты сбросить их или понесешь дальше, срывая, будто спелые плоды, и вкушая их сладкий яд?"

traits.locale_text: "А ты, значит, молод{mf|ой|ая} фон Валанциус. Весомое имя... и тяжелое, ведь, судя по ее репутации, Теодора обременила его многими грехами. Интересно, захочешь ли ты сбросить их или понесешь дальше, срывая, будто спелые плоды, и вкушая их сладкий яд?"

languages.text: "And you must be the young von Valancius. That name carries weight... and it is a burdensome one, for its reputation suggests that Theodora encumbered it with many a transgression. I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savouring their sweet poison?"
languages.original_text: "А ты, значит, молод{mf|ой|ая} фон Валанциус. Весомое имя... и тяжелое, ведь, судя по ее репутации, Теодора обременила его многими грехами. Интересно, захочешь ли ты сбросить их или понесешь дальше, срывая, будто спелые плоды, и вкушая их сладкий яд?"

traits.locale_text: "And you must be the young von Valancius. That name carries weight... and it is a heavy one, for its reputation suggests that Theodora burdened it with many a sin. I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savoring their sweet poison?"

I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savouring their sweet poison?"

I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savouring their sweet poison?"

I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savouring their sweet poison?"

languages.text: “你一定就是年轻的冯·瓦兰修斯。这个名字很有分量……而且非常沉重，因为它名声在外。这也说明，西奥多拉为这个名字带来了许多罪恶。我想知道，你是打算摆脱这些罪恶吗？还是打算带着它们继续前进，像采摘水果一样，沿途品尝它们甜蜜的毒药？”
languages.original_text: "And you must be the young von Valancius. That name carries weight... and it is a burdensome one, for its reputation suggests that Theodora encumbered it with many a transgression. I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savouring their sweet poison?"

traits.locale_text: “你一定就是年轻的冯·瓦兰修斯。这个名字很有分量……而且非常沉重，因为它名声在外。这也说明，西奥多拉为这个名字带来了许多罪恶。我想知道，你是打算摆脱这些罪恶吗？还是打算带着它们继续前进，像采摘水果一样，沿途品尝它们甜蜜的毒药？”

languages.text: «Usted debe de ser {mf|el|la} joven von Valancius. Ese nombre conlleva una gran carga... una carga pesada, cuya reputación sugiere que Theodora la llenó de transgresiones. Quisiera saber si su fin es expiarlos o acumularlos en sus viajes, como frutas llenas de dulce veneno».
languages.original_text: "And you must be the young von Valancius. That name carries weight... and it is a burdensome one, for its reputation suggests that Theodora encumbered it with many a transgression. I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savouring their sweet poison?"

traits.locale_text: «Usted debe de ser {mf|el|la} joven von Valancius. Ese nombre conlleva una gran carga... una carga pesada, cuya reputación sugiere que Theodora la llenó de pecados. Quisiera saber si su fin es expiarlos o acumularlos en sus viajes, como frutas llenas de dulce veneno».

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス家の若き当主とお見受けする。その名前には重みがあります…しかも、評判を聞くかぎりシオドーラ様は多くの罪を背負っていたことが伺えますから、かなりの重責でしょう。あなたはそのこびりついた罪を脱ぎ捨てるのか、それとも熟した果実のように摘み取り、甘い毒を味わいながら進んでいくのか…気になるところですね」
languages.original_text: "And you must be the young von Valancius. That name carries weight... and it is a burdensome one, for its reputation suggests that Theodora encumbered it with many a transgression. I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savouring their sweet poison?"

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス家の若き当主とお見受けする。その名前には重みがあります…しかも、評判を聞くかぎりシオドーラ様は多くの罪を背負っていたことが伺えますから、かなりの重責でしょう。あなたはそのこびりついた罪を脱ぎ捨てるのか、それとも熟した果実のように摘み取り、甘い毒を味わいながら進んでいくのか…気になるところですね」

languages.text: "Und Ihr müsst {mf|der|die} junge von Valancius sein. Dieser Name hat Gewicht ... und ist mit einer Bürde belegt, denn sein Ruf legt nahe, dass Theodora ihn mit vielen Sünden belastet hat. Wollt Ihr sie ablegen oder so weitermachen, sie am Weg wie reife Früchte pflücken und ihr süßes Gift genießen?"
languages.original_text: "And you must be the young von Valancius. That name carries weight... and it is a burdensome one, for its reputation suggests that Theodora encumbered it with many a transgression. I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savouring their sweet poison?"

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr müsst {mf|der|die} junge von Valancius sein. Dieser Name hat Gewicht ... und ist mit einer Bürde belegt, denn sein Ruf legt nahe, dass Theodora ihn mit vielen Sünden belastet hat. Wollt Ihr sie ablegen oder so weitermachen, sie am Weg wie reife Früchte pflücken und ihr süßes Gift genießen?"

languages.text: « Vous devez être {mf|le|la} jeune von Valancius. C'est un nom qui a du poids... Il est difficile à porter, car sa réputation laisse à penser que Théodora n'a pas été avare en transgressions. Une question me taraude... Allez-vous chercher à vous débarrasser de ces vices, ou préférerez-vous les conserver et continuer à en récolter toujours plus, comme autant de fruits bien mûrs au doux poison ? »
languages.original_text: "And you must be the young von Valancius. That name carries weight... and it is a burdensome one, for its reputation suggests that Theodora encumbered it with many a transgression. I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savouring their sweet poison?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez être {mf|le|la} jeune von Valancius. C'est un nom qui a du poids... Il est difficile à porter, car sa réputation laisse à penser que Théodora n'a pas été avare en péchés. Une question me taraude... Allez-vous chercher à vous débarrasser de ces vices, ou préférerez-vous les conserver et continuer à en récolter toujours plus, comme autant de fruits bien mûrs au doux poison ? »

languages.text: "Sen de genç von Valancius olmalısın. Ağırlığı olan bir isim... Gerçi bu ağırlığa yük de denebilir zira Theodora'nın bu ismin üzerine çok günah yüklediği söylenir. Bakalım sen o yükü sırtından mı atacaksın yoksa daha ileri taşıyacak, olgunlaşmış meyvelerini koparıp tatlı zehrinden mi tadacaksın?"
languages.original_text: "And you must be the young von Valancius. That name carries weight... and it is a burdensome one, for its reputation suggests that Theodora encumbered it with many a transgression. I wonder, will you seek to shed them, or will you carry them onward, picking them along the way like ripe fruit and savouring their sweet poison?"

traits.locale_text: "Sen de genç von Valancius olmalısın. Bu ismin taşıdığı belli bir ağırlık var ama bu ağırlığa bir yük de denebilir, Theodora'nın bu ismin üzerine birçok günah yüklediği söylenir. Acaba sen o yükten kurtulacak mısın, yoksa onu daha ileri taşıyıp, büyüyüp meyve vermesini sağlayıp, sonra da o lezzetli zehrini mi tadacaksın?"
